person.persName: Samuel B. Nisbet (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer, pvt in war of 1812)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. South Carolina native. Father of Francis M. Nisbet, Mary L. Nisbet, Wealthy A. Nisbet, and William W. Nisbet. Served in the 5th Regiment Kentucky Militia as a private in the War of 1812, from August 25, 1813, to November 15, 1813. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860.
